messages.content: ComfyQR is a set of ComfyUI nodes that allows users to dynamically create QR image layers for generative QR art without leaving the webui.
What is the purpose of the ComfyQR-scanning-nodes companion project?
The ComfyQR-scanning-nodes companion project provides a more definitive node for determining the scannability of QR codes using additional dependencies for reading QRs.
What are the two main nodes for generating QR codes in ComfyQR?
The two main nodes for generating QR codes in ComfyQR are 'QR Code' and 'QR Code (Split)'.
What is the purpose of the 'Mask QR Errors' node?
The 'Mask QR Errors' node analyzes the differences between a modified QR code and creates a mask of the estimated errors.
What are the available module drawers in ComfyQR?
The available module drawers in ComfyQR include Square, Gapped Square, Circle, Rounded, Vertical bars, and Horizontal bars.
What are the possible future updates for ComfyQR?
A possible future update for ComfyQR is the separation of alignment patterns based on module_size, border, and QR_VERSION for more advanced workflows.
What are the inputs required for the 'QR Code (Conformed to Image Size)' node?
The inputs required for the 'QR Code (Conformed to Image Size)' node are protocol, text, image_size, fill_hexcolor, back_hexcolor, error_correction, border, resampling, and module_drawer.
